pullrequest.title: Initial SRC cloudsim gazebo docker container

content.raw:
This looks good to me for creating an image for the simulator container.


Chatting with @scpeters the field container image probably just needs ros-indigo-ros-core with ihmc_msgs installed. The competitors would use that image as a base to install their code. I don't think that's relevant to this PR though.
content.html:
This looks good to me for creating an image for the simulator container.

Chatting with @scpeters the field container image probably just needs ros-indigo-ros-core with ihmc_msgs installed. The competitors would use that image as a base to install their code. I don't think that's relevant to this PR though.
